reviewText: I saw this on the BBC when it first came out, then I bought the VHS. Why there is no DVD available in Britain and I have to get it with (hideable) Dutch subtitles from a dealer in the USA is a mystery, because it's one of the best things the BBC have ever done: extremely witty, beautifully acted, and with (for the time) splendid effects. It is a very free adaptation of Swift's story, and the vignettes of Lilliputian court life are hilarious.
